mapper.insert: insert into setmeal (category_id, name, price, status, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.delete: delete from setmeal where id in #{id}
mapper.select: select s.id s_id, s.category_id s_category_id, s.name s_name, s.price s_price, s.status s_status, s.description s_description, s.image s_image, s.update_time s_update_time, c.name c_category_name, sd.id sd_id, sd.setmeal_id sd_setmeal_id, sd.dish_id s_dish_id, sd.name sd_name, sd.price sd_price, sd.copies sd_copies from setmeal s left join category c on c.id = s.category_id left join setmeal_dish sd on s.id = sd.setmeal_id where s.id = #{id}
